name: 洪媽益
objective: 課程重點：(1)藉由適合其程度的教材加強學生必備的基礎文法觀念和句型結構；(2)使學生確切把握閱讀要領以及充分瞭解寫作的各種技巧，重心在生字、片語、句法的解釋和基本寫作技巧的分析；(3)熟悉英語人士日常生活情境及與學生將來就業環境相關之會話及適當之應對方式；(4)透過練習加強聽、說、讀、寫的知能及表達。
schedule:
September 14/15, Class Orientation
September 21~September 29, Unit 1, Small Talk
October 5~13, Unit 2, Reading for Fun
October 19~27, Unit 3, Dreams and Ambitions
November 2~3, Midterm Exam and discussion
November 7~11 Midterm week
November 16~November 30, Unit 4, Amazing Inventions
December 1~15, Unit 5, the World of Food
December 21~January 4, Unit 6, Art and Creativity
January 5, Final Exam
January 9~13, Finals week
END
scorePolicy:
Joint Midterm and Final exams: 15/15
Class Midterm and Final exams: 15/15
Exercises and Homework: 30
Class Participation: 10
materials: Scooter and Hall. 2015. New Connection: Bring your English to the next level 3. B1-B2 Taipei: LiveABC. ISBN: 978 986 5776 95 4/ 9 789865 776954
